Possible-description-title-waiting-room: Please wait a moment for all players to join.
Possible-description-title-answer-gamebo: After answering the question, please press the 'Next' button and wait for others to answer as well.

header-create-game-intro: With this button, you can enter the game creation process from any section of the site and create your own game.
header-add-question-intro: With this button, you can write and save any question that comes to mind, which you may use in future games. You can also enter the answer if you know it.
header-find-game-intro: With this button, you can find a game by using the game code or the name of your friend who created it, and join from anywhere on the site.
side-menu-user-assets-intro: In this section, your name and surname along with your assets are displayed. This section is visible on all pages of the site, allowing you to always have quick access to your profile information.
side-menu-dashboard-intro: Your dashboard provides an overview of your activities and account status. This is where you can track your progress and quickly access different sections.
side-menu-games-intro: In this section, you can explore various games available and choose the one you want to play. There are plenty of games waiting for you to challenge your skills.
side-menu-trivia-hub-intro: Trivia Hub is the place where you can view all past questions and games. This section allows you to revisit the history of games and questions.
side-menu-shop-intro: In the shop, you can purchase various items to enhance your gaming experience. From special features to asset bundles, everything is available for you.
account-overview-dashboard-section-intro: This section provides an overview of your account, divided into two main parts: The first part covers your game history, scores, levels, and coin assets. The second part contains your personal details, such as registration date, referrer, and other relevant information.
top-question-dashboard-section-intro: This section displays the top questions, divided into two categories: your top questions and the top questions from all players.
invite-friends-dashboard-section-intro: In this section, you can invite your friends to the system by sending an email or sharing your exclusive referral code. Please note that you need to play several times before receiving your first invitation.
charity-dashboard-section-intro: In this section, you can choose a charitable cause, and each time you play, a portion of the coins you pay to join the game will be donated to that cause.
scoreboard-games-section-intro: In this table, you can see your recent game scores. The scores are displayed in chronological order, providing details for each game.
live-games-section-intro: In this section, you can see a list of games currently looking for players. You can easily join one of these games and start playing.
friends-recent-games-section-intro: In this section, you can see the recent games played by your friends. This list shows which games your friends have recently participated in and how they performed.
survival-games-section-intro: This table shows the scores of players in Survival games. You can see your scores and compare your progress with others.
live-survival-games-section-intro: In this section, you can see the list of Survival games currently live. Join one of these live games and enjoy an exciting experience.
friends-survival-games-section-intro: In this section, you can view the recent Survival games that your friends have participated in. See how your friends have performed in these challenging games.
features-shop-section-intro: In this section, you can purchase special features such as invitations. These features allow you to access new experiences and special opportunities in the game.
bundles-shop-section-intro: In this section, you can explore different bundles that include multiple items at a special price. Purchasing bundles allows you to save money and get several valuable items at once.
assets-shop-section-intro: This section offers a variety of coins that you can purchase to progress in the game. These coins will help you gain more options and advantages during gameplay.

intro.step1: Trivia Hub, or the Library, is where all games and questions are archived. In this section, all the questions in the system are archived, allowing you to access previous questions.
intro.step2: In this tab, questions are archived in the form of complete games that have been played, allowing you to review the results and questions from past games.
intro.step3: This section contains all the questions in the system, presented without any categorization or sorting, and applicable to all players.
intro.step4: In this section, only the questions related to you from the different games you have played are displayed.
intro.step5: In this section, the questions that you selected and bookmarked from the All Questions section are displayed.

By-playing-you-making-difference: By playing our game, you're not just having fun—you're making a difference.
We-allocate-portion-income: We allocate a portion of our income to support various charitable causes.
Select-category-closest-heart: Select the category closest to your heart and know that your choice directly contributes to positive change.
You are participated in: In this section, you can see a list of games currently looking for players. You can easily join one of these games and start playing.
